articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.title: The OnePlus 9 will include a charger - The Verge
articles.description: OnePlus CEO Pete Lau says the upcoming flagship will come with a charger. While Samsung S21 and Apple iPhone 12 phones don’t include a charger, the OnePlus 9 will continue to ship with one.
articles.content:
The OnePlus 9 will be formally announced March 23rd.
Image: OnePlus
